## DateValueProvider.getValue() method

Gets DateTimeValue from single value based on format

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getValue(value: TDate, format: string): DateTimeValue<TDate>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | TDate | Current value to be converted to ranged value |
|  format | string | Format that is requested to be displayed, it tells what range should be created |

<b>Returns:</b>

[DateTimeValue](./datetime.datetimevalue.md)<!-- -->&lt;TDate&gt;
